description:
Nami`s soft spot for children prompts her to call off the escape and declare war on anyone who makes a kid cry. Meanwhile, Luffy and the gang take a banana boat to the icy side of the island!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kodomo-tachi o Sukue! Ichimi Sentou Kaishi
Sauver les enfants. Que le combat commence !
Save the Children! The Straw Hats Start to Fight
Спасти Детей! Команда Мугивары вступает в бой!
子供達を救え! 一味戦闘開始
